sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A proclamation against Patrick Carnagy Scotland. Privy Council. Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty, Edinburgh : 1680.
Caption title. Royal arms at head of text; initial letter. Intentional blank spaces in text. Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the twentieth and fourth day of December, one thousand six hundred and eighty years, and of Our Reign the thirtieth and second year. Signed: Pat. Menzies, Cls. Sti. Concilii. Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======

Menzies, Cls. Sti. Concilii. Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
his most sacred Majesty
the heir of Andrew Anderson
